about.title: A Pleasure to Meet You
about.introduction: I am a Commercial Engineer specialized in E-commerce and Web Development, with solid experience leading high-impact projects in digital environments. My background includes managing e-commerce strategies, optimizing user experiences (UX/UI), and implementing high-performance campaigns on websites and mobile applications. I have collaborated with global brands like Nespresso, developing digital solutions that increase conversion rates and enhance customer satisfaction.
about.skills: My passion for technology and digital channels has allowed me to integrate technical and analytical skills to design user-centered shopping experiences and monitor performance through tools like Google Analytics. I also have experience in front-end development, where I combine my knowledge of design and programming to create functional and visually appealing interfaces.
about.callToAction: If you are looking for someone who combines strategic and technical skills to take your project to the next level, don't hesitate to contact me. I'm ready for new challenges and opportunities!

Business and Organization
